title: Midnight Harbor
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Wow, what a beautiful place to do a shoot~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Isn't it? I had the chance to go there for this magazine's photo shoot. You can enjoy the night view of the harbor from the cafe's terrace seating. It was lovely.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>You look so mature in this magazine. The night view really suits you. I wish I could be like you.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>My, then why don't the three of us go there next time?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>That sounds great~. I'll pick out your clothes, Hanayo-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Then I'll take care of your makeup. I'll give you a mature look.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eh? I-, it's fine. I don't belong in such a stylish place.... Besides, a mature style wouldn't fit me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>We'll see about that.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>You never know unless you try. I think you have the necessary constitution, Hanayo-chan~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I can't! There's no way~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
